PageDescription: Work on all kinds of office documents within Confluence using ONLYOFFICE Docs
WorkOnAllKindsOfOfficeDocuments: Work on all kinds of office documents within Confluence using ONLYOFFICE Docs
EditAndCoAuthorOfficeDocuments: Edit and co-author office documents within the Confluence interface
DocumentsTab1Label: Work with uploaded office files in the Attachments list
DocumentsTab2Label: Create and edit text documents, spreadsheets, and presentations
DocumentsTab3Label: Create, annotate, and fill out PDF forms
DocumentsTab4Label: Collaborate on documents with your colleagues in real-time
MarketplaceConnectorTitle: Designed for seamless integration with Confluence
MarketplaceConnectorDescription: Get the ONLYOFFICE app for Confluence now from the Atlassian Marketplace.
FeaturesFormats: Support for more than <0>50 file formats</0>, fully compatible with MS Office formats: DOCX, XLSX, PPTX.
FeaturesAIHelper: A robust set of editing, formatting, and styling tools. Integrated <0>AI helper</0>.
FeatureCoEditing: Real-time and paragraph-locking <0>co-editing</0>, review, version history, document comparison, comments & chat. Audio and video calls.
FeaturesEnhancedSecurity: <0>Enhanced security.</0> Flexible access rights and JWT. Activity tracking and audit reporting. Encryption at rest and in transit. Watermarking and password protection. Open source code.
FeaturesEasyConfiguration: <0>Easy configuration.</0> Seamless integration with ready-to-use connector from the Atlassian Marketplace. Available for Confluence Server, Data Center, and Cloud.
FeaturesFreeTrial: Scalable Enterprise versions. <0>Free 30-day trial.</0> Self-hosted solution for total control over your data. Docs Cloud version for Confluence Cloud.
HowToStartStep1: Deploy <0>ONLYOFFICE Docs</0> on your own server or sign up for <1>ONLYOFFICE Docs Cloud</1>.
HowToStartStep2: Get the integration app from the <0>Atlassian Marketplace</0>. Select the corresponding option by switching the hosting tabs (Server / Data Center / Cloud).
HowToConnect: How to connect ONLYOFFICE Docs to Confluence
ReadDetailedInstructions: Read detailed instructions in the <0>Help Center</0>.
NeedAnAppToConnect: Need an app to connect ONLYOFFICE Docs to your favorite web service? Or have you developed one?
